name: vuex-reactive-persist
description: Persist the vuex states to localstorage and watch for changes
author: Sudipto Chandra <dipu.sudipta@gmail.com>

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run test:size
scripts.patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Update version:patch' && git push origin master && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Update version:minor' && git push origin master && npm publish
scripts.major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'Update version:major' && git push origin master && npm publish
